```{r}
ppg <- read.csv('ppg2008.csv')
costco <- read.csv("costcos-geocoded.csv")
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(reshape2)
full <- melt(cor(ppg[2:21]))
ggplot(full, aes(x = Var1, y = Var2, fill= value )) + geom_tile()+ scale_fill_gradient2(low="blue", high="red")
```

```{r}
ggplot(costco, aes(y= Latitude, x= Longitude))  + borders(database = "state", fill= 'lightgray') + geom_point(alpha= .3, color= 'red') + theme_bw()
```

```{r}
ggplot(ppg, aes(x= MIN, y= PTS)) + geom_point() + geom_density2d(aes(color = ..level..), show.legend = TRUE)
```
